data.title: About
data.meta_description: I am Suresh Sambandam, Founder and CEO of OrangeScape. Started this personal blog on 6th June 2010. Â On this blog, I will primarily talk about technology related to cloud computing and things around it. There will also be occasional posts on entrepreneurship,Â innovation, startups and few other matters. After an initial entrepreneurial stint of 3 Yrsâ€¦
data.text:
After an initial entrepreneurial stint of 3 Yrs at the age of 19 in my small home town Cuddalore (just 18 kms south of Pondicherry ðŸ™‚ ) , I went on to work at Hewlett-Packard at Bangalore for close to 4 years. There I was part of a team which built a sophisticated rule engine (Talarianâ€™s RTIE â€“ real time inference engine) based â€˜Fraud Detection Systemâ€™ for TACS Mobile Phone Networks for Vodafone

Later, I joined Selectica as software analyst and rose to a senior position, as Director of Engineering, for the e-Insurance product division, in a span of 3.5 years. The e-Insurance division and its products were later acquired by Accenture.

In the technology side I worked in the areas of software architecture for complex enterprise applications, inference engines, configuration engines, rule-based computing & enterprise middleware. I have three patents (20030204629, 20060200772 & 20080256432 ) one in each of the last 3 organizations I worked. Aha, finally I used my patents. ðŸ™‚ ! After founding OrangeScape, my work has been around Business Planning, Technology Marketing,Establishing Partner Sales Channels, Evangelicalism, Analyst Relations, Fund Raising,Operations Management.
